whatIsService.title: What Is Cosmetic Surgery?
whatIsService.content:
Cosmetic surgery encompasses a range of surgical procedures designed to enhance appearance and improve aesthetic appeal. Unlike reconstructive surgery, cosmetic surgery is elective and focuses on improving normal structures to achieve desired aesthetic goals.

Cosmetic surgery can address various concerns including facial aging, body contouring, breast enhancement, and other aesthetic improvements. Modern techniques emphasize natural-looking results with minimal scarring and faster recovery times.

At The Skin Firm, our cosmetic surgery procedures are performed by Dr. Karishma Singh, who combines surgical expertise with an artistic eye to deliver results that enhance your natural beauty while maintaining harmony and proportion.

faqs.title: FAQs on Cosmetic Surgery in Pune

questions.question: How do I know if I'm a good candidate for cosmetic surgery?
questions.answer: Good candidates are in good health, have realistic expectations, are non-smokers, and have specific aesthetic goals. A consultation with Dr. Karishma Singh will determine your candidacy.

questions.question: How long do cosmetic surgery results last?
questions.answer: Results vary by procedure but are generally long-lasting. Facial procedures may last 10-15 years, while body contouring results can be permanent with stable weight.

questions.question: What should I expect during recovery?
questions.answer: Recovery varies by procedure but typically involves initial swelling and bruising, gradual healing over weeks, and final results visible in months. We provide detailed recovery guidelines.

questions.question: Are there risks with cosmetic surgery?
questions.answer: All surgery carries risks, but complications are rare when performed by qualified surgeons. We discuss all risks during consultation and follow strict safety protocols.

questions.question: Can multiple procedures be done together?
questions.answer: Yes, combining procedures is often possible and can be more efficient. Dr. Singh will assess safety and feasibility based on your specific case.
